mapper.select: SELECT a.id orderId, b.customer_name customerName, b.customer_phone customerPhone, b.room_in_time roomInTime, b.room_out_time roomOutTime, b.category_name categoryName, b.number, a.pay_type payType, a.remark, a.hotel_id hotelId, c.`name`, c.phone, c.address, c.latitude, c.longitude, a.fb, a.integral, a.fb_discount fbDiscount, a.integral_discount integralDiscount, b.deposit, IFNULL(d.coupons_discount, 0) couponsDiscount, IFNULL(d.coupons_id, 0) couponsId, IFNULL(d.coupons_num, 0) couponsNum, a.real_price realPrice, b.activity_id activityId FROM t_order a JOIN t_order_room b ON a.id = b.order_id JOIN t_hotel c ON a.hotel_id = c.id LEFT JOIN t_order_coupons d ON a.id = d.order_id WHERE a.id = #{orderId} AND a.member_id = #{memberId} AND a.hotel_id = #{hotelId}
